website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with irresistible and healthy bits of raspberry leaves, apples, and cranberries, this high-variety mix will keep your chinchilla or degu excited about what can be discovered at every meal.
pros: Alfalfa meal, wheat, soybean meal, and oats are the first four ingredients
Includes tasty ingredients like pine cones, carrots, and flower petals
cons: It would be nice if these bags were available in larger sizes

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Food  by Tasty Treats That Encourage Foraging Behavior
customer_reviews.text: This is my Chinchilla's favorite food. I can't find it any more locally. Both Eddie and I were pleased Amazon had it. Eddie was getting diffident about his food, and there was a lot left in the bowl when I fed him. Now Eddie's a member of the Clean Plate Club. This good basic food and it encourages foraging behavior to keep Eddie alert and to keep him from getting bored. Thank you, Amazon, for carrying this food.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Midkiff

customer_reviews.title: Good variety but too much fruit
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas love it, it’s full of healthy little things, my only complaint is the big pieces of dried fruit (I think it’s mango). A handful of food will have several of these pieces, which is way too much to give in a day. So I have to pick them out and break them up. If you’re switching from plain pellets to a variety mix this would be a good choice, just beware that fruit can cause serious problems when given in surplus.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Best Food for Chinchillas. Period.
customer_reviews.text: A while ago, my chinchilla started acting a little sluggish and wasn't eating or chewing as much. There were no noticeable causes for problems other than the food I was giving him seemed to be having less and less natural ingredients and more dyed pieces of "who knows what." I switched to this brand of food and shortly thereafter, he was back to his happy and hyper self. This contains the normal pellets they need, but it also has a myriad of healthy and natural food items for chinchillas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Rose

customer_reviews.title: They eat it first
customer_reviews.text: The fact that all 9 of my Chins love this added to there food says something about it. the first thing they do is go thru there food and pick out all of the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Pappa Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Awsome food
customer_reviews.text: One of the only foods I've given my chinchilla that she'll actually eat. Other foods come with extra garbage basically. This has been the only food where I don't take an extra look to see what exactly it is I'm about to put in her bowl
customer_reviews.author: Franc

customer_reviews.title: which I read was bad to give to chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: Got a lot of stuff my chinchilla loves, however, it also has quite a few pine cones. She hates those. Also wish there was a bit more treats to this mix. All other treat foods I find have raisins in it, which I read was bad to give to chinchillas. However, some other dried fruit pieces would be nice. Maybe more dandelion bits and rose hips.
customer_reviews.author: Mother_Of_Mayhems

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla approved.
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves it. My only problem is that it has pine cones in it, so I have to be careful to pick them out. Since it is so full of treats I mix it with oxbow chinchilla food...that way he isn't eating all treats. I bought it because it was cheaper than Charlie Chinchilla food but I think I will continue buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not his favorite...
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla does not like many of the ingredients. He prefers the oxbow pellets and dandelion drops.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great chinchilla food
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves this over the regular bits, especially the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: AUrso

customer_reviews.title: Best Chinchilla Food with a Hearty, Healthy Mix
customer_reviews.text: We've had chinchillas for 25 years, and Vitakraft is far and away the best food for the price. An excellent, fresh mix that I'm thankful to see on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: WiildAngels

customer_reviews.title: Good quality meal/ snack chinchilla food
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves this fiod. Just be aware it has a lot of "snacks" mixed in which can be unhealthy in large quantities. Since my chin picks out the snacks first... I make sure he doesn't get too many at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Vitakraft chinchillas food
customer_reviews.text: Was full of great things treats they loved except the cones and hard seeds. Then they changed it less raisins less treats like the stars and other things they really liked. They do love the little dark wood in their what ever it is.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loved this. He doesn't pick pieces from it he eats all of it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: We have a picky chinchilla. I've tried several different ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a picky chinchilla. I've tried several different foods for him, and this is the ONLY one he actually eats.
customer_reviews.author: CCalvin

customer_reviews.title: Other brands he would pick thru to find what he liked & just leave the rest of the food in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food that my chinchilla will eat completely, he loves it!! Other brands he would pick thru to find what he liked & just leave the rest of the food in the bowl or worse throw it out so it was all over the cage/floor.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Lambert

customer_reviews.title: My picky chinchilla loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous kinds of food for my chinchilla and this is the one kind that actually has good ingredients that he will consistently eat for 6 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Mhk1980

customer_reviews.title: Best foraging mix for chins.
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas LOVE this food. It is the best mix of stuff that I have found. I have been buying it since it was made by a different company and had a different name. I think it was called Sunaturals back then.
customer_reviews.author: B. A.

customer_reviews.title: Our chinchillas love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our chinchillas like this food best, and we have tried several. There are bay leaves in this one that they love.
customer_reviews.author: BookStorm

customer_reviews.title: Ground up Pellets
customer_reviews.text: A large amount of this package is ground up fluff that looks like someone stomped around on the bag for twenty minutes. The first time around, I was willing to put it up to bad shipping. Then our second bag was the same. I ended up having to strain out all the junk. The chinchillas like the pellets and that miscellaneous stuff in there though.
customer_reviews.author: Zuhra St. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Only food our Chins will eat. Great price and so convenient to ship Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla is the pickiest little butt in the world but loves this stuff. He won't eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this product and so does my chinchilla
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Filgate

customer_reviews.title: Waffles loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Chinchilla is a picky eater. This is her fav food!
customer_reviews.author: R. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my chinchilla's favorite food. He will hardly eat other types of chinchilla food, only this!
customer_reviews.author: D Lippstreu

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food that I permit my chinchillas to eat. Great food, great price, great service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pegmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety of Foods
customer_reviews.text: We love the variety of different greens, berries and vegetables. My chinchilla is very healthy and happy he loves his Vitakraft Vita.
customer_reviews.author: Razzle

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Most of the food was crushed into dust. The chinchillas preferred other food
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chins love this stuff, and it doesn't seem to have any harmful additives. They actually tore through the plastic packaging to get more! I've been monitoring their poop for a while now and everything looks healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Douglas

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas won't eat anything but this! Great healthy mix and they won't throw it around
customer_reviews.author: natt

customer_reviews.title: Loved by Chins
customer_reviews.text: I received a big bag of this as a free sample and my two chinchillas LOVE it! I don't know if I'd recommend it as a sole diet but I like it as a treat/supplement! Thanks vitakraft!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Laws Faktor

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my chinchilla's favorite food. It has a lot of ingredients that he likes, not just pellets. Good price at Amazon, too.
customer_reviews.author: keoni

product_meta.title: Vitakraft Vitanature Chinchilla Food - Natural Timothy Formula, 2.75 Lb.
product_meta.description: Signature chinchilla food is a delicious, high-variety diet Containing the key nutrients that chinchilla companions need. Natural flowers, herbs, and greens are blended with vegetables, grains, and berries to provide a nutritionally rich diet free of artificial colorings, flavorings, and preservatives.
feature_bullets: Natural Antioxidants To Support The Immune System.
Long Strand Fiber To Maintain Healthy Digestion.
High Ingredient Diversity To Encourage Natural Foraging Behavior.
Contains Natural Herbs, Flowers And Greens Blended With Vegetables, Grains And Berries
